author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ALBERTO NEAR THE COAST OF MEXICO... ...HEAVY RAINS AND GUSTY WINDS STARTING TO SUBSIDE FOR THE TEXAS  COAST, BUT SHOULD CONTINUE THROUGH THIS MORNING ALONG NORTHEASTERN  MEXICO...
summary:
...ALBERTO NEAR THE COAST OF MEXICO... ...HEAVY RAINS AND GUSTY WINDS STARTING TO SUBSIDE FOR THE TEXAS  COAST, BUT SHOULD CONTINUE THROUGH THIS MORNING ALONG NORTHEASTERN  MEXICO...
 As of 4:00 AM CDT Thu Jun 20
 the center of Alberto was located near 22.3, -97.3
 with movement W at 13 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 993 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Alberto (AT1/AL012024)
